channel.title: I am so stuck can someone please help me?
channel.description: Well basically i have been trying to make a myself a server-following the turorial. I got to the where it tells me to edit the two files but i can't find them...can someone please help me?

item.title: I am so stuck can someone please help me?
item.dc:creator: @Wariors Wariors
item.description:
@Wariors wrote:

ok here’s a picture explaining where the two files are in your source folder if you right click on each of these and select the “edit” option…the notepad will pop up with some text delete and replace with the text that samurai said.

Read full topic
item.source: I am so stuck can someone please help me?

item.title: I am so stuck can someone please help me?
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

ok then make them, make a new text document in it put @echo off COLOR 0F title Your server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause and save it as compiler.bat (make sure its in your source folder) make now make another text document and in it put @echo off title Your server color 09 java -Xmx1014m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server save it as runserver.bat (again make sure its in your source folder) and it should work

Read full topic

item.description:
@dany wrote:

Well they are called Compile.bat and Runserver.bat
if you can help thanks[br][size=1]Posted at: November 29, 2006, 02:29:35 PM[/size][hr]i did…[br][size=1]Posted at: November 29, 2006, 02:30:13 PM[/size][hr]i unzipped it with wrar and then its got all these files…where do i look for it?
